name: Super Hero Final Battle 2017
description:
Have you ever thought that what would you do if you would've all the super powers?
Well it's time to stop thinking and enjoy this amazing super battle final hero game.
The earth is in the shadow of criminals, terrorists and evil legends. The criminals are robbing the city banks, harassing and killing people. Super natural villains have only one aim, to kill you and become the most powerful and rule the world.
It's a war between you and super power villains.
You are the super hero of your people. With some great super powers come some great responsibility to protect your people and land from evils. Eliminate the terrorists and evils from your world and stop their evil plan of ruling on earth. Remember cops can't fight with everyone so you have to start taking things into your hands.
Protect the children women and old people from the terror and become their true hero.

FEATURES:
- Fly your super hero
- Fight with villains
- Realistic Graphics and physics
- Levels to complete
